definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Two stallions fight at a wild horse conservation center in South Dakota.
sentences.chinese: 在南達科塔的野馬保護中心裏兩匹雄馬在打架。

sentences.english: The king sent people to get the yellow mare, but found it a black colt.
sentences.chinese: 秦穆公派人去取馬，沒想到是一匹黑色的雄馬。

sentences.english: What's worse, it was a male horse.
